Meet the economist, and researcher behind the
DMIE Model's innovation.

Donatien Malala

Donatien Malala is a renowed economist. He worked for the Congolese public transport company ONATRA. He acquired extensive experience in logistics analysis, interland transport, port management, human resources, marketing and finance. You can email him at malaladonatien@gmail.com
